ItemTooltips.branches: Start off with some basic attributes and some regen.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots:
With early phase and aquila you will have enough damage to kill 1v1.
Stick will give you the remaining mana from charges!
ItemTooltips.greater_crit:
Buy whatever fits in your game. Mkb if they have evasion, crit of you lack damage and butter if they have a lot of physical damage.
Or get an diffusual against omni (or just for the manaburn and purge).
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo:
Drums is good overall, good attributes, attackspeed and movementspeed.
Together with manta, these will give you some survivabilty.

AbilityTooltips.mirana_starfall: Remember to get as close to the target as possible to secure that extra strike!
AbilityTooltips.mirana_arrow: No need to explain this awesome spell!
AbilityTooltips.mirana_leap: Use leap to get close to a target for starstorm or to get away.
AbilityTooltips.mirana_invis: Really good for saving teammates or setting up teamfights or ganks.
